titles.title: Reclaiming Individual Liberty Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the mandate that individuals purchase health insurance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/3/2013--Introduced. Reclaiming Individual Liberty Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions added by the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act requiring individuals to purchase and maintain minimum essential health care coverage.
